config: One minute relaxation activity that you can do whenever you are feeling stressed or worried.

description: Put your feet flat on the floor and your hands in your lap.
Close your eyes if you feel comfortable doing so.
Ask yourself, "What am I thinking now?"
Notice your thoughts. Notice if they are positive or negative.
Notice how your body feels. Notice anything that hurts or is tense.
Listen to your breath as it goes in and out.
You may want to say to yourself: "Itâ€™s okay. Whatever it is, I am okay."
Then just listen to your breath for a while.
Notice how your whole body feels.
Listen to the sounds in the room.
Think: "Do I feel different at all?"
When you are ready, open your eyes.
